import React ,{useState} from 'react' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' function NavBar({movies,setMovies}) { // Search const [searchItem, setSearchItem] = useState(" "); // Create a search function function searchAnything(event){ const matchItems = movies.filter((dt=>{ return ` ${dt.title}` .toLowerCase() .includes(event.target.value.toLowerCase()) })) setMovies(matchItems); } return (
HOME
WATCHLIST ADD
) } export default NavBar
